msg_desc.message: Immediate Shot is a Chrome Extension that takes screenshots quickly with one click.

msg_option_description_title.message: Replaced with title tag of target page.

msg_option_description_url.message: Replaced with URL of target page.

msg_option_description_counter.message: Replaced by 'counter' below. It will be incremented each time it is called.

msg_option_title_counter.message: File name counter(use '{{counter}}' by File name.)

msg_option_max.message: If checked, the maximum width of the website will be searched from all elements (please try if the full screen screenshot does not work)
